text: Apple announces an updated Mac Pro
full-pick-text: Apple announces an updated Mac Pro. The starting price remains at $6,999. The starting system on a chip is the Apple M3 Ultra chip with 32-core CPU, 80-core GPU, and 32-core Neural Engine. There is a build-to-order option that exceeds the unified memory available on the Mac Studio, which currently tops out at 512 GB.
